pages.text: Some say that bark is the most magically potent part of the tree, so early witches learned to strip bark from wood using an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)$(item)Athame$().$(br2)$(o)Do note that some woods are simply too hard to strip bark from.$()

Bark can be used for many things, one of those being $(item)Wood Ash$().$(br2)Wood Ash is created by putting Bark on a $(item)Campfire$(). When thrown into a filled $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron)$(item)Witch Cauldron$(), it will immediately empty it.
